snippet: Prosecutors will most likely use newly presented evidence to argue that John F. Haggerty Jr. stole money from Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg to close on a property in Queens.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors will most likely use newly presented evidence to argue that John F. Haggerty Jr. stole money from Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg to close on a property in Queens.

headline.main: Details of Home Sale Emerge in Consultant’s Trial for Theft
headline.print_headline: Details of Home Sale Emerge In Consultant’s Trial for Theft
headline.seo: In Haggerty’s Trial, Details of Home Sale Emerge
